website_summaries.verdict: Four pans for one price in a set that delivers an excellent value for those who need versatility.
pros: Set consists of 3 round springform pans of 7", 9", and 10", along with a 4" heart-shaped pan
Consists of a carbon steel material that's safe to use for all kinds of foods without having them stick
cons: Build quality of the material in the pans is not as sturdy as some other models

customer_reviews.title: Comes with a mini heart-shape cake pan!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cake pan set so that I can attempt to make a cheesecake in my instant pot. This is a great set because it comes with three different round sizes and an added bonus is that it comes with a cute, small heart-shape cake pan. I may just use this to make my husband a mini cake for our upcoming anniversary! This set is made of non-toxic coating material which is BPA free, which is important to me knowing my health and well-being is safeguarded. The latches unlock easily and the pans are very easy to clean. I highly recommend this set for all bakers!
customer_reviews.author: MerrY RevieWer

customer_reviews.title: Great springform pans
customer_reviews.text: I got these as I was baking a three layer cake for an event this week and needed a few pans including the heart (because it’s downright adorable). The cakes came out beautifully and the pans disassemble for easier cleaning. I was using a rather thick cake mixture so there was no leakage at all but for a wetter mixture it might leak- but I definitely didn’t have any leakage as I had placed a metal sheet down for any dripping but it came out clean
customer_reviews.author: Alex S

customer_reviews.title: My cakes are pretty than yours!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Grabbed these for the holidays and I'm already using them, they are very easy to use, the latch is easy and they clean well!!! I prefer these over my cake pans. They seem durable enough to last me for years to come!!!! The heart pan is ADORABLE its probably one of my favorites!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cutenluvble

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful set!!
customer_reviews.text: Those pans are amazing !! Perfect sizing , and the quality is very good.. I love baking and this set is going to be extremely helpful . The size of each pan is just perfect to make a perfect layered cake with it . I highly recommend it !!!
customer_reviews.author: AngelaBld

customer_reviews.title: Throw away pans.
customer_reviews.text: I used the pans to make wedding cake, it came out beautiful. Then I tried using the pans to make anything else and they won’t keep shut. They pop open and the bottom comes out after I pour everything in it already. I would not recommend and I would not buy again. At first I was impressed but after the first use the pans are pretty much useless.
customer_reviews.author: MommyJ4

customer_reviews.title: Not Impressed
customer_reviews.text: Maybe it was user error but these pans are not the business. I used them to make Japanese cheesecake and despite the 4 layers of foil i coated them with batter not only leaked out but water got into the pan. Perhaps i need to make a heavier cake in them next time but the seals on these things are garbage. But overall I didn’t really have any problems with the non stick coating but cleaning the cracks and crevices afterward was a bit of a pain.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Be gentle with these
customer_reviews.text: Non stick pans of any kind are only good as long as you are careful with them. If these are hand washed and dried immediately they should last a while. I trim a cake circle to fit the bottom of the 10 inch pan for cheesecake. No risk of scratches from removing the cheesecake from the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: E. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: awesome springform cake pan
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my baking needs. The spring form pans function nicely and have a non stick surface, they are of a good weight and not flimsy at all. They came with a frosting spreader and a smoother. They were packed very nicely. I recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: ***MX***

customer_reviews.title: Simple and fun
customer_reviews.text: Set of 4 is very useful. Different sizes makes baking very easier. These pans are less time consuming too. Could really save 2 to 3 min when compared to previous ones. The quality of the pan is really good. Easy to clean as we can separate the bottom. Worth the price. Useful for all household.
customer_reviews.author: Divya

customer_reviews.title: Reasonable
customer_reviews.text: These pans are really awesome. Price is very reasonable. Their is a small heart shape pan, that is best. I love it 🤓
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Different Sizes
customer_reviews.text: I started to bake thanks to this. You have different size options. I am saving the heart shape for valentine's day. It is great that they offer different sizes. It is really cheap. I compared the prices with other stores. This is the best deal. The cake doesn't stuck. It is easy to clean. The cuffs are working good.
customer_reviews.author: Ilay Ayhan Turkmen

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, but they leak..
customer_reviews.text: They come apart easily and go back together pretty quickly as well. Sometimes it’s hard to make sure they line up, but even when they are perfectly... they leak. Beat for cheesecake that have a crust blocking the bottoms. My cake batter was sleeping out of these. Slowly but enough to stink up my oven from dripping and burning on the bottom. So definitely line your oven floors with foil for a quick clean up. I spray the sides with oil spray and they do good not sticking.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: good size, easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I adore these baking dishes !! I am very pleased with this set - the sizes of bakeware have been chosen very well. I like the shape in the shape of a heart, it can be used as a form for pancakes if you remove the bottom, or for an omelet. round detachable forms are very convenient to use for the formation of layered salads, in my photos I used the largest form for the decoration of salad.
customer_reviews.author: Nusya

customer_reviews.title: Leaking pan, can't bake in it.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this set to bake cake for my daughter. It arrived late and I didn't use it for baking until yesterday. I baked cakein it and it kept on leaking from one side. I ended up using aluminum foil under the pan. I tried returning it today but return window has closed. I wish I would have tried this set earlier. Lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: Saba Abbasi

customer_reviews.title: Won’t be using. Wish I could just return
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my school. The worked great at first but it’s very hard to clean the not bottom but round part. They also leak very bad and messed my assignment cakes up and leak all over my oven. Won’t be using anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Newarknj360

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cake pan set. The sizes are perfect for a 3 tier cake. They are also easy to stack in each other for easy storing.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Rios

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: I just made my birthday cake using this one. It is super useful. Easy to cook and easy to disassemble. Cake won't stick on after I coated butter on them. 4 layers could make any shape. I made a cream cake using this set. Next time I will try some shapes using gum paste.
customer_reviews.author: Waxinton

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Overall I'm satisfied but one of the springforms leaked a little while baking. No big deal but I could smell the drips burning while it was baking. I would still recommend this if you want a variety of sizes for a good price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will probably buy other sizes from you I love them
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect I absolutely love them they were definitely easy to clean they didn't make a mess all over my oven they didn't leak
customer_reviews.author: Kittinn

customer_reviews.title: lovely Set
customer_reviews.text: Can't Find better than this set!! first of all I got the heart Pan and its amazing. I don't know why other people didn't get the hear pan !!! I was concerning about if it will leak but it did not leak and very high quality product. The materials these pans made of, it make so easy to wash it.
customer_reviews.author: Amjad almaarafawi

customer_reviews.title: You need to buy two if you want to make double layered cake
customer_reviews.text: I bought this almost as a mistake but ended up keeping it because I love it so much. We had a housewarming party last week and finally got to use it. Pretty good, non-stick, no complaints there. There's a tiny little heart pan that I might use to make cake for myself when I am feeling upset haha. We wanted to make a double layered cake but this set only has one thing of each size. So make sure you check the dimensions before you buy.
customer_reviews.author: Yuwei Pan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: Although my first order did not meet my expectations, the customer service is outstanding. They sent a replacement and are giving me a chance to try and update my review. For that alone, I give them 4 stars. Once I try the new replacement, I might have to come and update it to 5 stars. 😉
customer_reviews.author: Andrades

customer_reviews.title: Springform Cake Pan Set: 3 rounds and a little heart shape makes it 4 pans in the set.
customer_reviews.text: I love these pans! Used them for making my Christmas cake. Everything came out beautiful. I washed them by hand, very easy to clean. The little heart shape is so cute!
customer_reviews.author: Alta

customer_reviews.title: Non-stick baking pans
customer_reviews.text: I like the different sizes it comes with, especially the heart one I'll be using for Valentine's Day & my husband's birthday😊
customer_reviews.author: Carlos A. Portillo

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: It is affordable price and easy to clean. I baked a cake and was easy to take it out. It is non-stick pan. It is great for those who like bake.
customer_reviews.author: Thu Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Great for baking
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for baking and also afforadable. I love the outcome on how my cheesecake turns out.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Ryusuke

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: It came early and I had all 4 pans as promised! Very exited to use these. They look like they are good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME SET OF PANS!!!
customer_reviews.text: These pans are without a doubt the best pans I've EVER used! There was no leakage while my cakes were baking & once the cakes had cooled, the pan removal went without a hitch! And what a great price, too! I highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Cushing

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, but superb quality
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my wife's birthday. Quality is very good and they do not weigh like other bakeware in my kitchen. Nice and light..
customer_reviews.author: Nkit

customer_reviews.title: Heart cake pan leaks
customer_reviews.text: The heart cake pan leaked all over even when making sure everything was secure
customer_reviews.author: LM

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that nothing sticks to them but once you open them it's like they never live up completely thought afterwards. So you end up with a small leak
customer_reviews.author: Tinesha Bates

customer_reviews.title: As described.
customer_reviews.text: As described. Just started baking cakes, so I’m new to the whole thing
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price paid
customer_reviews.text: I found it nice , thought the heart pan would have been bigger but it's really small, material or was made from isn't really sturdy at all but what did I expect with that price.
customer_reviews.author: Tasheika

customer_reviews.title: Leaks
customer_reviews.text: Leaked First time used 10" leaked all over picture attached. Hopefully the other ones are not defected. Missed the return window. Wish I had tried when I first bought
customer_reviews.author: Jody Oberto

customer_reviews.title: It comes with the heart shaped pan
customer_reviews.text: These cake pans look great and everything came in as described. It came with the heart shape which was most important. Will test them out in the upcoming week.
customer_reviews.author: Vilma

customer_reviews.title: Ok.
customer_reviews.text: Works ok, but they dont seal like they should. Have to wrap the bottom in foil to keep it from leaking.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Rayl

customer_reviews.title: Well made and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set. Nice and sturdy and easy to clean. They seem like they will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly

customer_reviews.title: Great value, but the do leak
customer_reviews.text: It works reasonable well for the price, but all of the pans do have leaking issues which can make unmolding cakes a bit challenging. Lining the bottom pan with parchment paper helps considerably.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Cheesecakes is my GAME !
customer_reviews.text: Love these spongiform pans ! My cheesecake look great now. Just be sure to foil the pans before baking. I do recommend these pans.
customer_reviews.author: Orly

customer_reviews.title: For the price not bad
customer_reviews.text: Great pans, but the heart was a big disappointment. Leaked right through as soon as you pour into it. If you don’t clean the indent at the bottom properly it gets disgustingly dirty of old cake batter. Other than that great baking pans.
customer_reviews.author: Irelys Mendez

customer_reviews.title: The rounded pans are good but not the heart one
customer_reviews.text: The rounded ones work perfectly but I had to throw the heart one out because it was leaking all over the place. I honestly didn’t care because it was a great price for even 3 pans and I didn’t really did need the heart pan.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: These a fabulous pans
customer_reviews.text: This product turned out a perfect 5 tier cake with the heart on top! Can't say enough about how great they wash and clean up afterwards also.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa A. Hinkley

customer_reviews.title: THEY SUCK
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these back in November of 2019, but used it for the first time today...September 30, 2020. The bottom keeps popping out. I am not impressed. Too bad I cannot return it! I WILL NEVER BUY THESE AGAIN!
customer_reviews.author: Janeyia

customer_reviews.title: Is not leak proof at all
customer_reviews.text: I was so exited to receive this product but it was a total disaster. Is not leak proof and I end up having a disaster in my kitchen. Will not recomend this product
customer_reviews.author: Dacha Tollinchi

customer_reviews.title: Good Product in Price Range
customer_reviews.text: Good Quality Product in Price Range. Comes with 3size so its perfect for different occasions.
customer_reviews.author: Harjeet

customer_reviews.title: Good plans for price!
customer_reviews.text: Love them. You might need an 11” pan to make a good tier cake. There isn’t much room between the 10” and 9” when you’re looking at it.
customer_reviews.author: Alanna McCarthy

customer_reviews.title: very bad health hazard material it pealed and changed to rusted martial from 1st time use
customer_reviews.text: very bad health hazard material it pealed and changed to rusted martial from 1st time use
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I have enjoyed using my springform pans and suggest to anyone who is looking for some to try these.
customer_reviews.author: Janette Epps

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Worked great!! Made my cheesecake and the pan was exactly what I meeded
customer_reviews.author: bhhhh

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Nice! love this cake pan set, easy to make ice cream,5 stars for interesting item.
customer_reviews.author: kendall

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Made cheesecake in one of them. Works great and easy to clean!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: I loved them, used them to make my wedding cake, came on time and worked great!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jerrod andrews

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the sturdiness!! Also no leaks like the set from “that store”.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Remember to flip the bottom of the pan so that the lip around it is facing away from the cake.
customer_reviews.text: I love that extra tiny heart shaped pan! I can’t wait for a special occasion do that I can make a multi layered cheesecake.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality cake pans
customer_reviews.text: I used this for my baby birthday these cake pans are really very nice i got very nice cakes without any cracks.
customer_reviews.author: Chand Ram

customer_reviews.title: Thrilled
customer_reviews.text: We are absolutely thrilled with the pans, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Grant

customer_reviews.title: Must Have
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love the quality of the products and super easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Alejandra Garcia

customer_reviews.title: No heart shaped pan included
customer_reviews.text: There is supposed to be a heart pan included. I got 4 round!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great set but received a rusting pan
customer_reviews.text: Inside of one of the pans is rusting, see picture
customer_reviews.author: Spyderpig

customer_reviews.title: Best pans for a beginner
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised with ho easy it was to use this pan. I used the middle round pan to make my cake. I put aptly parchment on the bottom per cake baking instructions on making it the easiest to come out of the pan and it little came out so easy!!! It did not stick on the sides or anything. When cleaning, it was as easy as whipping it down because nothing stuck to it. I am so excited to use the little heart pan!!!
customer_reviews.author: AloraTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely non stick
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely non stick! I loved to use this baking pan. The dough didn’t stick to the form at all. I was so surprised! I sprayed the pan with oil before pouring the dough in there. I was really worried that it will be a challenge to remove the cake out of the pan, but I was so surprised when it basically slid out. It didn’t leak at all. I tried just one pan. If I change my opinion I’ll update my review! So far I enjoy it!
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Sticks every time!!
customer_reviews.text: Good pans as far as construction and such...however, even with nonstick spray an such, every time I have used these, my items stuck.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Lear

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice pans
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty good. I bought one set they sent me two and charged me for them. I wish the heart pan was a little bigger because if you tower them it's so much smaller that the smallest pan I need lots of piped flowers to fill in the space.
customer_reviews.author: KaelinasMom

customer_reviews.title: Nice .. too hard to clean
customer_reviews.text: I made a wonderful cake with these pans , but a lot of work dealing with the pans ... They stuck to the bottom and sides really bad, and were very difficult to clean afterwards. I’m returning them because it’s too much
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Cake Pans
customer_reviews.text: These are a great buy. Shipping was fast as I received them the next day. They were packed with care so they didnt move around in the box or scratch. It comes with 4 different pan and my favorite is the heart shaped pan. Good material and easy to clean. I'm really happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy Archi

customer_reviews.title: Very nice bake pans
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had a chance to use yet, but can say that the pans appear to be well built and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: lhs

customer_reviews.title: Cake pans
customer_reviews.text: Love these spring form cake pans specially to make delicious cheesecakes
customer_reviews.author: Marissa Ordaz

customer_reviews.title: Not used yet
customer_reviews.text: Gave this item as gift. Recipient has not used as yet
customer_reviews.author: mrsummers

customer_reviews.title: Nice pans!
customer_reviews.text: Well, my Mom is the baker in this family and she is so picky with bakering pans, but she is so happy, no complaints about these pans! I would buy them again!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Gallardo

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: The heart shape pan is so cute. Perfect for loved ones individual cake!
customer_reviews.author: sarah adeyta

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Just got these pans over the weekend and they look great! Can't wait to use them!
customer_reviews.author: Kei

customer_reviews.title: Leaking
customer_reviews.text: After using them once they started leaking the second time around.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Guth

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: About to use them this weekend for the first time
customer_reviews.author: SES

customer_reviews.title: The perfect cake pan set
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cake pan set specifically for my sister’s baby shower and it worked out beautifully! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Naomi

product_meta.title: Springform Cake Pan 4 Pieces (4"/7"/9"/10") 1 Heart and 3 Round,Leakproof Nonstick Bakeware Cheesecake Pan with Removable Bottom
feature_bullets: Springform Pan Set Including:1pcs heart shaped 4 inch And 3pcs round 7,9,10 inch.
Oven safe to 450 degrees Fahrenheit. Made of a strong,durable,superior heavy carbon steel material, BPA free.
Cake pan set Leak-Proof tight seal prevents messy spills.
Nonstick coating for easy food release and cleanup.

100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEE - We are so confident that you will be pleased with our premium product. If you do not absolutely love it for whatever reason, just contact us, we will refund your FULL purchase or get a brand new replacement!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars290 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
